doc.field: PLAINS PETROLEUM CO PLP> 3RD QTR NET

Shr 15 cts vs 13 cts Net 1,352,000 vs 1,210,000 Revs 5,953,000 vs 3,309,000 Nine mths Shr 36 cts vs 27 cts Net 3,257,000 vs 2,416,000 Revs 16.6 mln vs 9,705,000 NOTE: If FASB adopts accounting changes, then 1987 3rd qtr per share results will be restated to 22 cts, and 54 cts a share for 1987 nine mths.
